title: RP BUG
body: Few days ago I went to put a PaySafe 20 euro.I received 3700 rp and I took blood moon Yasuo and rengar. I had have 1700 rp but now I have only 34 rp.Please help me.This is awful!

replies.body: I went ahead looked over your account's store history and it looks like there have been more purchases made after Blood Moon Yasuo and Rengar. If this was accidental or wasn't intended, hit us up through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll be able to look deeper into what happened.
have you looked at the purchase history?
